commands: test ! -f SERVICE_PREFIX/database && mkdir -p SERVICE_PREFIX/database && chmod 700 SERVICE_PREFIX/database

test ! -f SERVICE_PREFIX/service.conf && printf '
port = SERVICE_PORT
dbpath = SERVICE_PREFIX/database
logappend = true
logpath = SERVICE_PREFIX/service.log
pidfilepath = SERVICE_PREFIX/service.pid
unixSocketPrefix = SERVICE_PREFIX
fork = true
' > SERVICE_PREFIX/service.conf
